title: GV Prakash kumar to play the male lead with Jyothika in director Bala next film - Tamil Movie News
text: GVP to start an exclusive trust for TN Farmers A few days back director Bala sparked a surprise with the announcement that he will be teaming up with actress Jyothika for his next. While Jo will play the female lead in a Bala directorial for the first time, it was said that the film will also a leading hero as the male lead. Now speculations are rife that G.V.Prakash Kumar will play the male lead character in the film. If this information is true it will be a tremendous fillip for GVP's acting career. GVP has rendered music score for Bala's National award winning period flick 'Paradesi' and this will be the first time he will be acting under the ace film-maker's direction. The popular music director turned hero is presently busy shooting for multiple films such as 'Adangathey', '4G' and 'Ayngaran'. He also has 'Sarvam Thaala Mayam' which will be directed by Rajeev Menon with A.R.Rahman's music score.
